segments.advisor_message: So, to wrap things up, is there any, uh, specific goals you have in mind for your, um, investment strategies moving forward?
segments.client_message: Well, I mean, I really just want to, uh, make sure I'm saving enough for, um, my kids' college, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Right, right, so college savings, got it. Any other objectives?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, I think, maybe like, um, retirement too, 'cause I, you know, want to be comfortable when I, uh, stop working.  And, uh, also, uh, getting a bit of passive income would be nice.

segments.advisor_message: Passive income sounds, uh, interesting! So, we can look into that as well. And just, um, clarify for me: you want to focus on these, uh, both saving for college and, um, retirement?
segments.client_message: Yeah, exactly! And, um, I guess just kinda manage everything better, 'cause sometimes it feels a bit, uh, overwhelming.
